p: The SARS-CoV-2 another protease enzyme, PLpro known to be involved in cleaving of N-terminal of viral polyprotein which is also an important antiviral drug target. It also plays a crucial role in its replication along with 3CLpro (Baez-Santos et al. 2014). The 3D structure of PLpro used in the docking simulation is the x-ray structure of SARS-CoV, which has the highest similarity with the PLpro of SARS-CoV-2.
